main event: Two round, bright crimson objects were seen maneuvering at Lexington Airport in March 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 to 3 minutes.,The objects were described as very bright and traveling at a high rate of speed.,Both objects seemed to disappear over the horizon heading East.,Military pilots were the confirmed observers of this event.,There is a possibility that the local airport beacon may have caused some confusion.
